EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that item list must be in Excel format
EmailTemplate.name: WRF Excel File Needed
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF Excel File Needed: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Work Request submission for {!Case.Account}. We appreciate the opportunity to work with you.
In order for us to price a bid or work request, you will need to provide an item list file in an Excel format that contains a column with one of the following:
· OD,
· Manufacturer, or
· Major competitor item numbers (at a minimum).
If the item list you have is not in an Excel format, please submit a Field Work Request to HCL using the following link:
http://sp.na.odcorp.net/sites/BSG/FWR/default.aspx
Select the Excel Bid List Request Type and attach the file and template for HCL to key the item #'s into. If you only have hard copies, they can be faxed to HCL at 408-962-1117.
Once you have received the Excel file, please reply to this email with your attachment.
Thank you,
BSD BIDS
